verbose_text: Despite the fact that the same total amount of STAT3 decoy (10 mug free decoy or loaded on MB) was administered to all mice, STAT3 decoy MB + UTMD treatment nearly doubled the intratumoral radiolabeled decoy concentration eight hours after treatment compared to infusion of radiolabeled STAT3 decoy alone or STAT3 decoy MBs without UTMD (p < 0.05, Fig. XREF_FIG).
